item.title: U.S. stock futures rise as Wall Street looks to extend winning streak in November
item.description: U.S. stock-index futures gained Sunday, after the major equity benchmarks extended their monthly winning streaks in October.

item.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in November 2025 on Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max and more
item.description: Netflix’s ‘Stranger Things’ kicks off its final season, ‘Pluribus’ is revealed on Apple, and ‘Landman’ returns to Paramount+

item.title: ‘I don’t want to worry about money’: I’m 64 with $400K in savings and $700 in Social Security. Can I retire next year?
item.description: “I take in about $2,200 in monthly rent from four properties.”

item.title: I’m planning to retire at 65 when my twins are 15. How will this impact their healthcare coverage?
item.description: “By retiring when they are in the 10th grade my income will be low when they apply for college scholarships.”

item.title: This stock-market rally isn’t letting up. Could it be making investors too greedy ahead of year’s end?
item.description: Stocks just logged their best midyear stretch since 1950. Is it time to take some profits?
